sys_properties.description: Here You can define how many records should be deleted in summary in each table. This counter is used to simplify the debuging. If there are less records deleted, some records pretended to be returned by the querry wasn't found in the target table. If there are more records returned by the query, the deletion script terminates and no records are deleted. You can check Your query outside the script and ensure, that the returned records are all to be deleted. Once you will be done with the check, You can adjust the counter.
sys_properties.name: C.objectCounter
